translations: v.装备（kit 的过去式和过去分词）

phrs.translation: 酶联免疫试剂盒（Enzyme Linked Immunosorbent Assay Kit）
重复工具包；维修工具；工作服

sentences.sentence: They were all kitted out in brand-new ski outfits.
sentences.translation: 他们配备齐全，包括全新的滑雪服装。

sentences.sentence: Its capacity was reduced to 90,000 and the ground was kitted out with the latest technology in the form of video scoreboards.
sentences.translation: 其容量减少到9万并且场地了最新的技术形式——视频记分板。

sentences.sentence: Its capacity was reduced to 90, 000 and the ground was kitted out with the latest technology in the form of video scoreboards.
sentences.translation: 她的容量被减少到可容纳9万观众，并且球场装备了最新技术的屏幕记分牌。
